title: Token Launch

title: Initial NFT Offering
text: Regenerative NFT offering support to real world initiatives with prooved track record and proof of positive impact. NFT utility for DAO or utility of value..

title: Initial Locked Liquidity Pool
text: For new of existing tokens with the need to activate their AMM and Decentralized Orderbook. LP reward Campaigns through locked liquidity offerings.

title: Donations
text: Complimentary donations to projects from the ReFi DAO, Green Pill and Celo ecosystem wtih proved track record who benefit from intermediate donation campaings without interfeering with Gitcoin rounds.
